___numberOfItems.description: Provide a hint about the expected number of items returned

___price.description: The price of a publication is tied to its acquisition link

___indirectAcquisition.description: Indirect acquisition provides a hint for the expected media type that will be acquired after additional steps

___availability.description: Indicated the availability of a given resource

___since.description: Timestamp for the previous state change

___until.description: Timestamp for the next state change

___copies.description: Library-specific feature that contains information about the copies that a library has acquired

___holds.description: Library-specific features when a specific book is unavailable but provides a hold list

___media-overlay.description: Location of a media-overlay for the resource referenced in the Link Object

___spread.description: Indicates the condition to be met for the linked resource to be rendered within a synthetic spread

___layout.description: Hints how the layout of the resource should be presented

___overflow.description: Suggested method for handling overflow while displaying the linked resource

___encrypted.description: Indicates that a resource is encrypted/obfuscated and provides relevant information for decryption

___scheme.description: Identifies the encryption scheme used to encrypt the resource

___compression.description: Compression method used on the resource

___original-length.description: Original length of the resource in bytes before compression and/or encryption

___algorithm.description: Identifies the algorithm used to encrypt the resource

___profile.description: Identifies the encryption profile used to encrypt the resource

___contains.description: Identifies content contained in the linked resource, that cannot be strictly identified using a media type.

___page.description: Indicates how the linked resource should be displayed in a reading environment that displays synthetic spreads

___orientation.description: Suggested orientation for the device when displaying the linked resource
